text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Stay out of It
text.summary: After being grounded for staying out at night, Sabrina fights with her mother, who does not permit her to join the volleyball team and later talks to her partner about cleaning the house's insulation to prevent mice from spreading an ongoing Hantavirus epidemic.
